title: LULU - Graine d'un Monde
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, European, French
description: A vegan/organic restaurant/tea room serves all kinds of teas (including herbal), fresh raw juices, lattes, cookies, muffins and other baked goods. Lunch offerings are salads, soups, sandwiches, tarts and savory cakes. Has daily specials. Most food is gluten free. All food is for take-out or dine-in. As most ingredients are local, seasonal, and made-in-house, menu is not fixed. A space for learning how to make you own deodorant, toothpaste, or non-polluting cleaning product is available, as is a cooking course.
